text: Jean Vallée (born Paul Georges M. J. Goeders; 2 October 1941 - 12 March 2014) was a Belgian singer and songwriter. He was made Knight in the Order of the Crown by HM Albert II in 1999. He was born in Verviers, Liège. Vallée died after a long illness on 12 March 2014. He was 72 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Belgian singer-songwriters Category:People from Verviers
title: Jean Vallée
